name: tm55
effect: Teaches Brine to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Brine)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.platinum: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: If the foe’s HP is down to under half, this attack will hit with double the power.
